name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_DAY】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [5NbNvtpj2-c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening credit sequence for Tokino Sora New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』, featuring song highlights and donor recognition lists.
Wide shot of the concert hall with the audience waiting for the performance to begin.

subtitles.original: 止まらないで
subtitles.english: Don't stop

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To everyone who sent gifts, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ここに宣言します
subtitles.english: I declare here

subtitles.original: ステップ、ステップワイズ
subtitles.english: Step, stepwise

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the performance starts.

subtitles.original: きっと やめるときも 健やかなるときもずっと
subtitles.english: Surely, in sickness and in health, always

subtitles.original: 愛を歌い続けることを どうぞ誓います
subtitles.english: I swear to continue singing of love

subtitles.original: MCもダンスももっと追求します
subtitles.english: I'll pursue MCing and dancing even more

subtitles.original: ずっと推してもらえるアイドルになってみせます
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can be an idol you'll support forever

subtitles.original: ようこそ...
subtitles.english: Welcome...

subtitles.original: 不安な未来も 私が照らすんだ
subtitles.english: Even an uncertain future, I will light it up

subtitles.original: それでも 落ち込んじゃう日は
subtitles.english: Even so, on days when I feel down

subtitles.original: 思い出しているよ みんなのその笑顔その声
subtitles.english: I'm remembering everyone's smiles and voices

subtitles.original: HAPPY LUCKY SEVEN革命 Sun-Mon
subtitles.english: HAPPY LUCKY SEVEN Revolution Sun-Mon

subtitles.original: この先ずっと一緒だよね
subtitles.english: We'll be together forever from now on, right?

subtitles.original: 約束 ほらね
subtitles.english: It's a promise, see?

subtitles.original: 笑う門にそれ来たる
subtitles.english: Fortune comes to those who smile

subtitles.original: HAPPY BIRTHDAY 毎日がほら Tue-Wed Lucky day
subtitles.english: HAPPY BIRTHDAY, every day is, see, Tue-Wed Lucky day

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わっても 迷わずに
subtitles.english: Even if I'm reborn, without hesitation

subtitles.original: 君だけのアイドルになるよ
subtitles.english: I'll be your idol only

subtitles.original: 何度も見つけてね ステップ、ステップワイズ
subtitles.english: Find me again and again, step, stepwise

subtitles.original: HAPPY LUCKY SEVEN革命 Sun-Mon
subtitles.english: HAPPY LUCKY SEVEN Revolution Sun-Mon

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the performance starts.
